room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: Sara spells workout an H! We had a great time in the Amnesia room.  Record time!!!  The secret to escape is wearing the costumes. THANKS AGAIN!!

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: I've done the Amnesia room and today our group from work did this again. I did Portlandia this time. This is a lot of fun and is great for team building. The staff is very friendly and professional. I highly recommend this for everyone and hope we get to do this again in the future.

room_title: Escape room "Amnesia" by Escape Games PDX in Portland
review: We did the Amnesia room and loved it. This was a great anniversary gift from my husband.
